lead_paragraph: At least three people were killed when a bomber attacked a United Nations peacekeeping base in northern Mali on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Mali: Bomber Attacks U.N. Base
headline.main: Mali: Suicide Bomber Attacks U.N. Base

snippet: At least three people were killed when a bomber attacked a United Nations peacekeeping base in northern Mali on Wednesday.
abstract: Suicide bomber attacks United Nations base in northern Mali, killing at least three people and wounding 16.
